name: Marilyn's Green Beans Italiano
author: MARILYN PERZIK
summary: These string beans are terrific as a side dish to any Italian main course. They are a staple in my kitchen.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into 1-inch pieces
directions: Place the green beans in a saucepan with a lid and pour enough water over the beans to cover; bring to a boil
Reduce the heat to low and cover; simmer until the beans are tender but still crisp, about 10 minutes
Spread the beans onto paper towels to dry
Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat; stir the bread crumbs and Parmesan cheese into the melted butter
Reduce heat to low; add the beans and cook and stir until the beans are heated through and the crumbs are beginning to brown, about 3 minutes
Sprinkle the parsley over the mixture to serve
